## Checklist

<!-- Ensure all items are checked before submitting -->

- [ ] My code follows the coding standards in CONTRIBUTING.md
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md under the "Unreleased" section
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

## For Plugin Submissions

<!-- If this is a plugin submission, complete this section -->

- [ ] Plugin includes `plugin.yaml` with complete metadata
- [ ] Plugin includes README.md with usage instructions
- [ ] Plugin has been tested and works as expected
- [ ] Plugin does not contain hardcoded paths or credentials
- [ ] Plugin handles errors gracefully
- [ ] Plugin logs important actions using `PluginLogger`
